text: Krzysztof Siemion (born February 1, 1966 ) is a Polish weightlifter. He won the Silver medal in 82.5 Kg in the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona. . ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Olympic silver medalists for Poland Category:Olympic weightlifters of Poland Category:Weightlifters at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Opole Lubelskie County Category:Polish male weightlifters
title: Krzysztof Siemion
